context: Mid-sized utility company planning $500M investment in renewable energy infrastructure over 5 years

request.justification: Regulatory requirements, cost savings from renewables, improved public image

decision_process.outcome: Feasibility confirmed with projected 25% cost savings
Strong stakeholder support with minor concerns about timeline
Approved with phased implementation over 5 years

business_impact.expected_outcome: 60% renewable energy mix by 2030, 25% reduction in energy costs

lessons_learned: Early stakeholder engagement critical for large infrastructure projects, phased approach reduces execution risk
